Package peer

Interface Peer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeerImp
    public interface Peer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    All the remote methods of a Peer, the basic element of a Node

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add_node​(PeerInfo info)
      Add the Peer and Manager of another node, not remote
      java.util.List<Content> find_network_contents​(java.util.List<PeerInfo> visited_peers, java.lang.String restriction)
      Lists all the files available in the network, called back recursively
      java.util.List<PeerInfo> find_seeders​(Content file, java.util.List<PeerInfo> visited_peers)
      Find nodes that own a certain file

    • Method Detail

      • add_node

        void add_node​(PeerInfo info)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Add the Peer and Manager of another node, not remote
        Parameters:
        info - The PeerInfo of this other node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - When remote calls fail

      • find_network_contents

        java.util.List<Content> find_network_contents​(java.util.List<PeerInfo> visited_peers,
                                              java.lang.String restriction)
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Lists all the files available in the network, called back recursively
        Parameters:
        visited_peers - List of all the PeerInfo's visited by this request
        restriction - Restriction of the returned files, looks like description|tag|name:desired data
        Returns:
        List with all the contents with file_data = null;
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if remote calls fail

      • find_seeders

        java.util.List<PeerInfo> find_seeders​(Content file,
                                      java.util.List<PeerInfo> visited_peers)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Find nodes that own a certain file
        Parameters:
        file - the file we are looking for
        visited_peers - List of all the PeerInfo's visited by this request
        Returns:
        List of all the PeerInfo's that own the file
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if remote calls fail
